about_the_game:
In the ominously crimson dusk, it is said there lies an otherworldly alley from which one can never return. A colossal sunset, dazzling yet enigmatically alluring, can be seen over the fence.

As you proceed down the path, a mysterious stage encircled by four torii gates emerges. And then, the sight of a girl walking towards you...

Can you uncover the anomalies and escape from this sealed, otherworldly realm?

[Warning]

This game contains scenes of blood, violence, and gore. Please proceed with caution.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Developer's Comment]

- 2025/2/8 Ver 2.0.1 Release -

[Apology]

Regarding Ver2.0.0, I deeply apologize to those who received the "development version" instead of the updated version "Ver2.0.0". The trouble with downloading the updated version has been resolved.

[Update Details]

  • Change in walking speed (updated to run at 1.5 times the speed of the previous version)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- 2025/2/7 Ver 2.0.0 Release -

[Update Contents]

  • Title Screen: Updated operation instructions (removed gamepad support) / Updated options (added volume settings and save function)

  • Main Game: Reconstructed maps (updated to map sizes optimized for game content) / Viewpoint changes with mouse control (2-axis movement) / Added pause function and mouse sensitivity adjustment / Enhanced zoom

  • Languages (English/Chinese): Reflecting text differences due to updates

  • Comments: I've improved the previously redundant maps and operability. The sense of inconsistency remains the same as the previous version. I believe this update has condensed the world view of my work.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my first game, blending the themes of "sunset," "alley," "afterlife," and "girl" to create a Japanese-style horror experience.

I believe I have successfully captured the world I envisioned. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed creating it.

[Game Description]

A mysterious and thrilling horror escape walking simulator with elements of subtle horror and searching for anomalies, inspired by "The Exit 8" and other titles.

1. Upon entering the otherworld, take note of the 'correct' state and move forward.

2. If no anomalies are detected, move forward. If anomalies are detected, turn back.

3. Aim to clear one loop from the eighth block to the first block.

4. There are a total of 31 anomalies. With a bit of luck, you can clear the game in as few as four loops, but it will typically take 6-8 loops.

[Gameplay Time]

Estimated playtime: 60 minutes to 120 minutes

[Controls]

Keyboard + Mouse / Gamepad *For detailed instructions, please refer to the in-game guide.

[Supported Languages]

Japanese, English, Chinese

[Video Streaming Guidelines]

For games released by EAR LCC (EAR Games), please adhere to the following guidelines:

- You may stream content, including game thumbnails and promotional videos, without permission, regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation.

- Monetization through streaming is only allowed if you use the functionalities provided by your chosen video streaming platform.

- EAR LCC takes no responsibility for any damages arising from posting or streaming game videos.

- If you stream the game, we would appreciate it if you could include a link to the Steam page in the description section of the site.

- These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

- We reserve the right to take legal action against any inappropriate content, including but not limited to defamatory, obscene videos, or videos that violate these guidelines.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

content_descriptors.notes: There is a gore scene used for horror effects.

name: Lured by Eerie Sundown

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A colossal sunset that enigmatically beckons you. Four mysterious torii gates encircle an eerie stage.And a girl walking towards you. Can you uncover the anomalies and escape this sinister world? Experience the ultimate Japanese mystery horror escape in this immersive walking simulator!
